original_text:
It was because of the Lord’s anger that all this happened to Jerusalem and Judah, and in the end he thrust them from his presence.
Now Zedekiah rebelled against the king of Babylon.
korean_text: 여호와께서 예루살렘과 유다에게 진노하심이 그들을 자기 앞에서 쫓아내시기까지 이르렀더라

sentences.original_text: It was because of the Lord's anger
that all this happened to Jerusalem and Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 일이 예루살렘과 유다에 일어난 것은

sentences.original_text: and in the end he thrust them from his presence
sentences.korean_translation: 마침내 그가 그들을 자신 앞에서 내쫓으셨다

sentences.original_text: Now Zedekiah rebelled against the king of Babylon
